weapons.name:
Gear/
Other
weapons.range:
Commands: This is a Cyber Familiar, its will is bonded to its master. It can perform simple pre-programmed tasks it understands, such as "Lay out my Vestments", "Copy that tract", "Hold aloft this scroll", "Fetch this item from my study", etc.

Programmed Instinct: Will never attack unless ordered to, will fleed if startled/injured. If left idle will perch in high places and occasionally steal small objects.

weapons.name: Flyer (5)
weapons.range: Has a flying speed of 5. Can hover.
